title: Balance your chakras for inner harmony
author: Deborah Quibell
description: Are your chakras in balance? Balancing these energetic fields is as important for your psychological well-being as balanced organs are for your physical health. In our exclusive video, expert Deborah teaches you a meditation practice that cleanses and energizes your chakras.
cleaned_text: There's nothing better for creating harmony between body and mind than meditation. Like each organ in the body performs a specific biological function, each chakra is responsible for a specific psychological function. Meditation expert Deborah Quibell shows you how directing your breathing can cleanse and nourish these energetic fields, leaving you feeling at peace with yourself and the world around you. Take a deep breath and watch this video.
